text: It Happened in Athens is a 1962 Greek American romantic comedy-drama movie directed by Andrew Marton and starring Trax Colton, Jayne Mansfield, Xenia Kalogeropoulou, Nico Minardos, Bob Mathias, Ivan Triesault, Titos Vandis. It was distributed by 20th Century Fox. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1962 comedy-drama movies Category:1962 romantic comedy movies Category:1962 romantic drama movies Category:American romantic comedy movies Category:American romantic drama movies Category:American comedy-drama movies Category:Greek movies Category:Movies directed by Andrew Marton Category:20th Century Fox movies Category:Movies set in the 1890s Category:Movies set in Athens Category:Movies about the Olympics
title: It Happened in Athens
